prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Drums, Synth Pad, Guitar, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Piano, Drums, Synth Pad, and Guitar, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Piano, Drums, Synth Pad, and Guitar, omitting Synth Lead.

Style 3:
This song has Bass, Piano, Drums, Synth Pad, and Guitar, excluding Synth Lead.
